personality.aries: Your Aries child has an energetic, brave and independent spirit. Leadership qualities come naturally and they love competition. They seek excitement and are open to new experiences. They may be impatient but their enthusiasm is contagious.
personality.taurus: Your Taurus child has a calm, determined and reliable nature. They love routine and stability, may resist change. They value tactile experiences and physical comfort. Their artistic abilities are high.
personality.gemini: Your Gemini child is curious, social and versatile. They constantly ask questions and want to learn everything. Communication skills develop early. They may get bored quickly, so they need varied activities.
personality.cancer: Your Cancer child has a sensitive, compassionate and intuitive nature. Family bonds are very important. They have a high need for a safe environment. Their imagination is rich and emotional intelligence is developed.
personality.leo: Your Leo child has a creative, generous and attention-grabbing personality. They love stage performance and being appreciated. Leadership roles come naturally. They show strong self-confidence but internally need approval.
personality.virgo: Your Virgo child has an analytical, organized and helpful nature. They pay attention to details and may show perfectionist tendencies. Their practical intelligence is high and they find happiness in helping others.
personality.libra: Your Libra child has a harmonious, fair and social personality. They avoid conflicts and try to create peace. Their aesthetic sense is developed. They may struggle with making decisions because they want to please everyone.
personality.scorpio: Your Scorpio child has an intense, determined and intuitive nature. They are deep thinkers and observers. There may be things they want to keep secret. Their loyalty is high and they take emotional bonds very seriously.
personality.sagittarius: Your Sagittarius child has an optimistic, adventurous and honest personality. They are fond of their freedom and don't like restrictions. They ask philosophical questions and constantly want to explore. Their energy is high.
personality.capricorn: Your Capricorn child has a serious, responsible and ambitious nature. They may appear mature for their age. They work hard to achieve their goals. They respect traditions and follow rules.
personality.aquarius: Your Aquarius child has an original, independent and humanitarian personality. They think differently and don't like conforming to patterns. They value friendships. They're interested in technology and innovations.
personality.pisces: Your Pisces child has a dreamy, compassionate and artistic nature. Their imagination is very rich. They are emotionally sensitive and have high empathy capacity. Their boundaries may be unclear, so they need structure and guidance.
personality.default: Your child has a unique personality.

learning_style.aries: Learns by moving and competing. Prefers short, fast activities.
learning_style.taurus: Learns through practical applications. Use tactile materials. Be patient.
learning_style.gemini: Learns by reading, talking and variety. Try different methods.
learning_style.cancer: Learns by making emotional connections. Stories and memories are effective.
learning_style.leo: Learns by performing and receiving appreciation. Give creative projects.
learning_style.virgo: Learns with systematic and detailed explanations. Proceed step by step.
learning_style.libra: Learns by collaborating and discussing. Partner work is effective.
learning_style.scorpio: Learns by researching deeply. Give independent projects.
learning_style.sagittarius: Learns by exploring and experiencing. Outdoor activities are effective.
learning_style.capricorn: Learns in a structured environment with goals. Show progress.
learning_style.aquarius: Learns using technology and in group projects. Try innovative methods.
learning_style.pisces: Learns with visual and musical materials. Allow them to use imagination.
learning_style.default: Discover your child's individual learning style.

social_style.aries: Takes the leader role. Loves competitive games. Patience must be taught.
social_style.taurus: Forms few but close friendships. Needs to learn to share.
social_style.gemini: Social butterfly. Makes many friends but may be superficial.
social_style.cancer: Selective friendships. Needs trust. Loves playing at home.
social_style.leo: Popular and charismatic. Wants attention. There may be drama.
social_style.virgo: Selective and helpful. Forms deep bonds with few friends.
social_style.libra: Harmonious and diplomatic. Avoids conflicts. Teaches fair play.
social_style.scorpio: Intense and loyal friendships. Earning trust takes time.
social_style.sagittarius: Friends with different groups. Adventurous and fun.
social_style.capricorn: Mature friendships. Takes responsible roles. Help them relax.
social_style.aquarius: Unusual friendships. Loves group activities. Respect individuality.
social_style.pisces: Empathetic and compassionate. Boundaries must be taught. Needs alone time.

emotional_needs.aries: Freedom and independence. Teaching to cope with obstacles.
emotional_needs.taurus: Security and stability. Physical comfort and routine.
emotional_needs.gemini: Mental stimulation and communication. Feeling heard.
emotional_needs.cancer: Emotional security and family bond. Being accepted.
emotional_needs.virgo: Order and feeling useful. Doesn't have to be perfect.
emotional_needs.libra: Harmony and justice. Freedom to make choices.
emotional_needs.scorpio: Trust and emotional honesty. Right to privacy.
emotional_needs.capricorn: Success and approval. Areas of responsibility.
emotional_needs.aquarius: Acceptance and individuality. Right to be different.
emotional_needs.pisces: Unconditional love and understanding. Freedom to dream.

parenting_tips.aries: Give plenty of room for physical activity. Play competitive games but also teach losing. Allow them to make independent decisions.
parenting_tips.taurus: Create routine and introduce changes slowly. Offer tactile experiences. Keep your patience, don't rush.
parenting_tips.gemini: Offer varied activities and nurture their curiosity. Keep conversations interesting. Develop focus skills.
parenting_tips.cancer: Create a safe and warm home environment. Allow them to express their feelings. Create family rituals.
parenting_tips.leo: Support their creativity and appreciate their achievements. Offer stage performance opportunities. Teach humility.
parenting_tips.virgo: Give constructive feedback, avoid criticism. Understand their need for order. Teach they don't have to be perfect.
parenting_tips.libra: Have them practice making decisions. Be fair and consistent. Support their social skills but help them find their own voice.
parenting_tips.scorpio: Earn their trust and respect their privacy. Be honest because they detect lies. Provide emotional security.
parenting_tips.sagittarius: Give freedom space and offer adventure opportunities. Take their questions seriously. Set boundaries gently but consistently.
parenting_tips.capricorn: Give responsibility but don't overload. Encourage fun. Celebrate achievements and appreciate effort.
parenting_tips.aquarius: Celebrate their difference and respect their individuality. Approach with logic. Help develop social consciousness.
parenting_tips.pisces: Support imagination but also set boundaries. Be sensitive to emotional needs. Provide structure and guidance.
parenting_tips.default: Accept and support your child as they are.

family_dynamics.earth: Your family is built on stability, security and practicality. Traditions are important and material comfort is part of family happiness.
family_dynamics.air: Your family focuses on communication, exchange of ideas and social activities. Conversations and discussions strengthen your family bond.
family_dynamics.water: Your family has deep emotional bonds and intuitive understanding. Empathy is high and you easily understand each other's feelings.
family_dynamics.default: Your family has a unique dynamic.

communication_style.air_heavy: Your family values verbal communication. Conversations and discussions flow naturally.
communication_style.water_heavy: Your family uses emotional and intuitive communication. You understand through feelings more than words.
communication_style.default: Your family uses a mixed communication style. Both verbal and emotional expressions are important.

daily_advice.earth: Cooking together or garden work strengthens your family bond.

daily_advice.water: Time for emotional sharing. Let everyone express their feelings.

aries.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to impatience and anger control. As an Aries, your desire to move fast can sometimes lead you to impulsive decisions. Your shadow feeds on the fear of being left behind.
aries.details: Shadow Aries: Excessive competitiveness, not listening to others' opinions, 'I know best' attitude, unfinished projects due to impatience. Anger outbursts and then regret cycles.
aries.advice: To face your shadow: Wait 10 seconds before doing anything. Accept that others may be right too. Turn competition into cooperation.
aries.warning: Warning: Suppressing your shadow strengthens it. Accept it and transform it.

taurus.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to stubbornness and material dependency. As a Taurus, your search for security can sometimes make you resistant to change. Your shadow feeds on fear of loss.
taurus.details: Shadow Taurus: Excessive possessiveness, resistance to change, getting stuck in comfort zone, putting material security before emotional security. Tendency toward laziness and procrastination.
taurus.advice: To face your shadow: Start with small changes. 'What I have is not who I am' mantra. Sometimes loss is gain.
taurus.warning: Warning: Excessive search for security can disconnect you from life.

gemini.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to inconsistency and superficiality. As a Gemini, your curiosity can sometimes scatter you. Your shadow feeds on fear of depth.
gemini.details: Shadow Gemini: Not keeping promises, scattered attention, tendency to gossip, avoiding emotional depth. Creating perception of being two-faced.
gemini.advice: To face your shadow: Focus on one topic and go deep. Write down and follow through on your promises. Discover the power of silence.

cancer.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to excessive sensitivity and manipulation. As a Cancer, your protectiveness can sometimes be suffocating. Your shadow feeds on fear of rejection.
cancer.details: Shadow Cancer: Emotional manipulation, getting stuck in the past, passive aggressive behaviors, playing the 'victim' role. Excessive protectiveness and control.
cancer.advice: To face your shadow: Express your emotions directly. Let go of the past, live in the present. Set your loved ones free.
cancer.warning: Warning: Retreating into your shell doesn't solve problems, just delays them.

leo.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to ego and approval dependency. As a Leo, your desire to shine can sometimes overshadow others. Your shadow feeds on fear of being invisible.
leo.details: Shadow Leo: Excessive ego, constant expectation of attention, inability to handle criticism, jealousy of others' success. Tendency to create drama.
leo.advice: To face your shadow: Praise others and let them shine. Find your own value from internal sources. Practice humility.
leo.warning: Warning: External approval doesn't fill the internal void.

virgo.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to perfectionism and criticism. As a Virgo, your attention to detail can sometimes be paralyzing. Your shadow feeds on fear of inadequacy.
virgo.details: Shadow Virgo: Excessive criticism (of self and others), feeling that nothing is ever enough, anxiety and worry, 'paralysis by analysis'. Condescension toward others.
virgo.advice: To face your shadow: Learn the concept of 'good enough'. See mistakes as learning opportunities. Show compassion to yourself.
virgo.warning: Warning: The pursuit of perfection can result in doing nothing.

libra.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to indecisiveness and conflict avoidance. As a Libra, your search for harmony can sometimes distance you from your own needs. Your shadow feeds on fear of being alone.
libra.details: Shadow Libra: Trying to please everyone, inability to express own opinion, passive aggressiveness, superficial relationships. Letting others make your decisions.
libra.advice: To face your shadow: Learn to say 'no'. Defend your own opinion. Healthy conflict is inevitable and necessary.
libra.warning: Warning: Trying to make everyone happy makes you the most unhappy.

scorpio.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to control and revenge. As a Scorpio, your intensity can sometimes be toxic. Your shadow feeds on fear of losing power.
scorpio.details: Shadow Scorpio: Excessive jealousy and possessiveness, manipulation, thoughts of revenge, distrust. Obsession with secrecy and paranoia.
scorpio.advice: To face your shadow: Learn to let go of control. Discover the power of forgiveness. Open up to build trust.
scorpio.warning: Warning: Revenge burns you more than the other person.

sagittarius.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to irresponsibility and commitment avoidance. As a Sagittarius, your love of freedom can sometimes be escape. Your shadow feeds on fear of being trapped.
sagittarius.details: Shadow Sagittarius: Commitment phobia, escaping reality with excessive optimism, not keeping promises, avoiding responsibility. Thoughtless words.
sagittarius.advice: To face your shadow: Learn that freedom and commitment can coexist. Consider the impact of your words. Face instead of running.
sagittarius.warning: Warning: Constant escape results in belonging nowhere.

capricorn.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to workaholism and emotional distance. As a Capricorn, your ambition can sometimes distance you from humanity. Your shadow feeds on fear of failure.
capricorn.details: Shadow Capricorn: Workaholism, emotional coldness, status obsession, seeing others as tools. Pessimism and hopelessness.
capricorn.advice: To face your shadow: Create work-life balance. Express your emotions. Expand your definition of success.
capricorn.warning: Warning: When you reach the top, there may be no one beside you.

aquarius.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to emotional distance and superiority complex. As an Aquarius, your uniqueness can sometimes turn into loneliness. Your shadow feeds on fear of being ordinary.
aquarius.details: Shadow Aquarius: Emotional disconnection, 'I'm above everyone' attitude, lack of empathy, avoiding close relationships. Rebellious pose.
aquarius.advice: To face your shadow: Don't be different just to be different. Create emotional connection. Remember you're part of humanity.
aquarius.warning: Warning: Being above everyone means being with no one.

pisces.main: {name}, your shadow self is related to escape and victim mentality. As a Pisces, your sensitivity can sometimes disconnect you from reality. Your shadow feeds on fear of suffering.
pisces.details: Shadow Pisces: Addiction tendencies (substance, relationships, fantasy), victim role, inability to set boundaries, escape from reality. Being deceptive or being deceived.
pisces.advice: To face your shadow: Set healthy boundaries. Choose confrontation over escape. Separate dream from reality.
pisces.warning: Warning: Constant escape from reality leads to greater pain.

red_flags.intro: {name}, here are your Red Flags! As a {sign}, being aware of these behaviors is important.

aries.main: {name}, here are your Red Flags! As an Aries, being aware of these behaviors is important.
aries.details:
Impatience and sudden anger outbursts
Making decisions without listening to others
'My way or no way' attitude
Quick boredom and leaving things unfinished
Not backing down in ego conflicts
Acting without thinking
aries.advice: When you notice these: Stop, breathe, count to 10. Consider that others may be right too.

taurus.main: {name}, here are your Red Flags! As a Taurus, being aware of these behaviors is important.
taurus.details:
Excessive stubbornness and resistance to change

aries.main: {name}, your life purpose is to open new paths and lead with courage. As an Aries, you were born to be a pioneer.

aries.advice: To live your purpose: Face your fears, take risks, give courage to others. Shine your best in leadership positions.

taurus.main: {name}, your life purpose is to create beauty and build secure foundations. As a Taurus, you were born to bring abundance.
taurus.details: Your Life Mission: Creating material and spiritual abundance, bringing beauty to the world, building safe spaces. You are a builder - you create lasting values.
taurus.advice: To live your purpose: Create beautiful things, produce value, make others feel secure. Shine your best by staying connected with nature.

gemini.main: {name}, your life purpose is to spread knowledge and build connections. As a Gemini, you were born for communication.

cancer.main: {name}, your life purpose is to nurture and provide emotional security. As a Cancer, you were born for compassion.
cancer.details: Your Life Mission: Giving emotional support, creating safe spaces, nurturing and healing. You are a caretaker - you heal souls.
cancer.advice: To live your purpose: Share your compassion, build home, protect others. Shine your best in caregiving roles.

leo.main: {name}, your life purpose is to shine and inspire others. As a Leo, you were born for creativity.
leo.details: Your Life Mission: Creative expression, inspiring, spreading generosity and joy. You are a sun - you illuminate those around you.
leo.advice: To live your purpose: Create, inspire, be generous. Shine your best in center stage and creative fields.

virgo.main: {name}, your life purpose is to serve and perfect. As a Virgo, you were born to heal.
virgo.details: Your Life Mission: Helping in practical ways, improving systems, bringing healing. You are a healer - you make everything better.
virgo.advice: To live your purpose: Serve, create order, offer healing. Shine your best in health and organization fields.

libra.main: {name}, your life purpose is to create balance and beauty. As a Libra, you were born for harmony.
libra.details: Your Life Mission: Providing justice, creating beauty, bringing peace. You are a mediator - you balance opposites.

scorpio.main: {name}, your life purpose is to transform and go deep. As a Scorpio, you were born for healing.
scorpio.details: Your Life Mission: Facilitating transformation, uncovering hidden truths, deep healing. You are an alchemist - you turn lead into gold.
scorpio.advice: To live your purpose: Dive deep, transform, offer healing. Shine your best in psychology and research fields.

sagittarius.main: {name}, your life purpose is to explore and share wisdom. As a Sagittarius, you were born to teach.
sagittarius.details: Your Life Mission: Expanding horizons, seeking and sharing wisdom, spreading the spirit of freedom. You are a teacher - you seek the meaning of life.
sagittarius.advice: To live your purpose: Explore, teach, inspire. Shine your best in education and travel fields.

capricorn.main: {name}, your life purpose is to build and leave a legacy. As a Capricorn, you were born to achieve.

aquarius.main: {name}, your life purpose is to bring innovation and serve humanity. As an Aquarius, you were born for revolution.

karma_lessons.main: {name}, as a {sign}, it's time to learn your karma lessons. The South Node represents past life habits, and Saturn represents your tests in this life. There are themes you need to work on in this life.
karma_lessons.details_template: Your karma lessons are determined based on your sign element and ruling planet. As a {element} element, you need to learn {lesson}.
karma_lessons.saturn_lessons: Saturn's house lessons: Responsibility and maturation
karma_lessons.chiron_wounds: Wounds shown by Chiron: Healing potential
karma_lessons.north_node: North Node: Your spiritual evolution direction
karma_lessons.karma_timeline_desc: Saturn return (around age 29) and Chiron return (around age 50) are major karma settlement periods.
karma_lessons.advice: Every challenge you face is a karma lesson. Recognize it, accept it, and transform it. Follow your transit chart to know active karma periods in advance.
karma_lessons.warning: Warning: If the same lessons keep coming to you, it means you haven't learned them yet. Face instead of running.
karma_lessons.fire_lesson: patience, humility, and thinking of others
karma_lessons.earth_lesson: letting go, trusting, and being open to change
karma_lessons.water_lesson: setting boundaries, realism, and emotional independence

soul_contract.main: {name}, before coming to this world, your soul made a contract. As a {sign}, your birth chart's North Node, Saturn, and 12th house carry traces of this contract.
soul_contract.contract_items: Main Articles of Your Soul Contract:
soul_contract.contract_intro: Your soul contract includes your life purpose, karma lessons, and basic experiences you'll encounter in this life. As a {sign}, you came to work on {theme}.
soul_contract.life_purpose: Life Purpose: The direction shown by the North Node
soul_contract.past_life_legacy: Past Life Legacy: South Node and 12th house
soul_contract.soul_connections_desc: Important people entering your life are also part of your soul contract. Moon Node connections in synastry charts show karmic soul bonds.
soul_contract.advice: To remember your soul contract: Meditate, pay attention to your dreams, observe recurring themes. The 12th house and Neptune position in your birth chart show doors to access your subconscious memory.
soul_contract.warning: The soul contract is not unchangeable. With your free will, you can make new choices at any moment.

tarot.title: Tarot
tarot.page_title: What do the cards tell you?
tarot.ancient_wisdom_intro: Tarot is a mirror of the subconscious. These cards do not show the future, but possibilities. Each draw reveals the current energy field and potential paths. Ask the cards a question or simply seek guidance. Trust your intuition - the answers are already within you.
tarot.kadim_note_content: Each Tarot card is an archetype of the collective unconscious. As Jung said, these symbols were born from humanity's shared dreams. When you draw a card, you start a dialogue with the universe. The answer is not in the card itself, but in the connection you make with it.

yes_no_answers.positive_card_reversed: {card} came reversed. Although normally positive, you may face obstacles now.
yes_no_answers.negative_card_reversed: {card} is in reversed position. This shows negative energies are dominant. I recommend waiting.
yes_no_answers.transformation_card: {card} is a transformation card. Yes is possible, but be prepared for unexpected changes.
yes_no_answers.positive_card: {card} carries positive energy. The path seems clear.
yes_no_answers.neutral_card: {card} is generally a positive sign. Cautious optimism is appropriate.

spread_labels.past_energy: In the past, {keyword} energy was active.

fool.name: The Fool
fool.upright: You are on the threshold of a new journey. Let go of your fears and leap into the unknown. The universe supports you.
fool.reversed: Recklessness or fear is holding you back. Don't act without thinking, but don't wait too long either.
fool.advice: Listen to what your heart tells you. Sometimes the greatest wisdom is accepting what you don't know.

magician.name: The Magician
magician.upright: All the tools are in your hands. You have the power to manifest what you want. Clarify your intention and take action.
magician.reversed: You may be wasting your potential. Watch out for manipulation or deception.
magician.advice: Balance all four elements - thought, emotion, action, and matter. Use your creative power consciously.

high_priestess.name: The High Priestess
high_priestess.upright: Trust your intuition. The answers are within. There is great power in silence and listening.
high_priestess.reversed: You may be suppressing your inner voice. Secrets or hidden information may surface.
high_priestess.advice: Time for meditation and inner journey. Pay attention to your dreams and intuitions.

empress.name: The Empress
empress.upright: Abundance and blessing energy is strong. You are in a cycle of creativity and fertility.
empress.reversed: Take care of yourself. Don't neglect yourself while caring for others. There may be creative blocks.
empress.advice: Connect with nature. Appreciate beauty. Show compassion to yourself and others.

emperor.name: The Emperor
emperor.upright: Leadership and structure themes emerge. Reflect on discipline and determination.
emperor.reversed: Excessive control or rigidity. Flexibility is needed. Conflict with authority figures.
emperor.advice: Set strong boundaries but don't be a dictator. Take responsibility, but also give others space.

hierophant.name: The Hierophant
hierophant.upright: Traditional paths and institutions are important. A teacher or guide may appear.
hierophant.reversed: Time to question traditions. Find your own spiritual path. Stay away from dogmatism.
hierophant.advice: Wisdom can be found everywhere. Learn from tradition but also seek your own truth.

lovers.name: The Lovers
lovers.upright: An important choice or union. Love and harmony energy is strong. Listen to your heart.
lovers.reversed: Disharmony in relationships. A choice that conflicts with your values. Inner conflict.
lovers.advice: True love begins with loving yourself. In your choices, listen to both your heart and mind.

chariot.name: The Chariot
chariot.upright: Victory is near. Your willpower and determination will carry you to your goal. You will overcome obstacles.
chariot.reversed: Loss of control or directional confusion. Opposing forces are pulling you apart.
chariot.advice: Focus on your goal. Balance your inner conflicts. Persevere on the road to victory.

strength.name: Strength
strength.upright: True strength lies in compassion. You will overcome difficulties with your inner courage.
strength.reversed: Lack of self-confidence or suppressed emotions. Rediscover your inner strength.
strength.advice: Don't deny your wild nature, love it and tame it. Gentleness is not weakness.

hermit.name: The Hermit
hermit.upright: Time for turning inward and contemplation. Step away from crowds, find your own light.
hermit.reversed: Excessive isolation or withdrawal. Or the opposite - escaping from solitude.
hermit.advice: There are answers in silence. Be your own guide but don't remain completely alone.

wheel_of_fortune.name: Wheel of Change
wheel_of_fortune.upright: Change themes are prominent. The cycle is shifting. A time for reflection on transitions.
wheel_of_fortune.reversed: Challenges or the descending phase of the cycle. This too shall pass. Be patient.
wheel_of_fortune.advice: Life's ups and downs are natural. Be grateful at the top, be patient during challenges.

justice.name: Justice
justice.upright: Justice will prevail. Honesty and truth are important. Karma is at work.
justice.reversed: Injustice or imbalance. Avoiding responsibility. Self-deception.
justice.advice: Accept the consequences of your actions. Be honest - first with yourself.

hanged_man.name: The Hanged Man
hanged_man.upright: Wait and surrender. Look from a different angle. Sacrifice may be needed.
hanged_man.reversed: Unnecessary sacrifice or playing the victim. Or resistance to surrender.
hanged_man.advice: Sometimes the way to progress is to stop. Change your perspective, the answer will appear.

death.name: Death
death.upright: A great transformation. The end of something, the beginning of something new. Resisting prolongs the pain.
death.reversed: Resistance to change. Inability to let go. Stagnation.
death.advice: Death is the gateway to rebirth. Let go of the old so there's room for the new.

temperance.name: Temperance
temperance.upright: Time for balance and harmony. Patience and moderation bring success. Healing energy is strong.
temperance.advice: Find the middle way. By blending opposites, achieve the golden synthesis.

devil.name: The Devil
devil.upright: Your addictions and fears are holding you captive. Face your shadow aspects.
devil.reversed: Time to break the chains. Liberation begins. Breaking free from addiction.
devil.advice: You put on your chains, you can also take them off. Dance with your shadow, but don't be its slave.

tower.name: The Tower
tower.upright: Sudden and destructive change. Rotten foundations are collapsing. But this is a purification.
tower.reversed: Avoided disaster or resistance to change. Inner destruction.
tower.advice: Sometimes everything needs to collapse so the real can remain. Accept the storm.

star.name: The Star
star.upright: Time for hope and inspiration. Healing and renewal. The universe is speaking to you.
star.reversed: Hopelessness or loss of faith. Disconnection from cosmic connection.
star.advice: Even after the darkest night, stars shine. Don't lose hope.

moon.name: The Moon
moon.upright: The subconscious is surfacing. Face illusions and fears. Pay attention to dreams.
moon.reversed: Overcoming fears. Awakening from illusions. Clarity.
moon.advice: Shadows are not real. Trust your intuition while walking in the dark.

sun.name: The Sun
sun.upright: Time for light, joy, and success. Everything is illuminated. Celebration!
sun.reversed: Temporary shadows or delayed success. Renew your connection with your inner child.
sun.advice: Don't be afraid to let your light shine. Your joy is contagious. Celebrate life!

judgement.name: Judgement
judgement.upright: A great awakening and calling. Reckoning with the past. Rebirth.
judgement.reversed: Self-doubt or being stuck in the past. Not hearing the call.
judgement.advice: Accept your past, live your present, create your future. Answer your call.

world.name: The World
world.upright: The cycle is completing. Success and wholeness. Transition to a new level.
world.reversed: Unfinished business or incomplete cycles. One more step is needed.
world.advice: Every ending is a new beginning. Celebrate your achievements and prepare for the next cycle.

morning.aries: You wake up with high energy! Great for physical activity and new beginnings.

morning.gemini: Mind is active, ideas are flying. Ideal for communication and meetings.
morning.cancer: Home and family-focused energy. Connect with your loved ones.
morning.leo: Creative energy is rising. Express yourself and spread your light.
morning.virgo: Focus on details, it's organization time. Make lists.
morning.libra: Seeking balance. Engage with aesthetics and beauty.
morning.scorpio: Deep thoughts. Suitable for research and analysis.
morning.sagittarius: Adventure spirit! Learn new things, explore.
morning.capricorn: Disciplined and focused. Do the hardest work in the morning.
morning.pisces: Remnants from dreams. Listen to your intuitions, meditate.

afternoon.aries: Competition energy is rising. Ideal for sports, competitions or job interviews.
afternoon.taurus: Material matters are in the foreground. Financial decisions and shopping.
afternoon.gemini: Social energy is at its peak. Network, meetings, correspondence.
afternoon.cancer: Emotional depth. Pay attention to relationships, intuitions are strong.
afternoon.virgo: Practical work. Health, order, service-oriented activities.
afternoon.libra: Collaborations and partnerships. Suitable for negotiations.
afternoon.scorpio: Transformation energy. Break old patterns, renew.
afternoon.sagittarius: Time for expansion. Education, publishing, travel plans.
afternoon.capricorn: Career focused. Goals, strategies, long-term plans.
afternoon.aquarius: Social projects. Group activities, community work.
afternoon.pisces: Creative energy. Art, music, spiritual practices.

evening.aries: Slow down the energy. Rest after physical activity.
evening.taurus: Relaxation time. A nice meal, comfort, peace.
evening.gemini: Mental rest. Books, movies, light conversations.
evening.cancer: Home time. Family, home, emotional security.
evening.leo: Romance and fun. Social events, celebrations.
evening.virgo: Evaluate the day. Planning, preparation, order.
evening.libra: Relationship time. Partner, friends, social connections.
evening.scorpio: Deep connections. Intimate relationships, secret meetings.
evening.sagittarius: New horizons. Future plans, dreams, hopes.
evening.capricorn: Evaluation time. The harvest of the day, drawing lessons.
evening.pisces: Spiritual time. Meditation, dream preparation, daydreaming.
evening.default: Experience the peace of the evening!

daily_advice.aries:
1. Be patient, not everything has to happen immediately
2. Listen to others, don't just talk
3. Balance your energy with physical activity
daily_advice.taurus:
1. Be open to change, step out of your comfort zone
2. Material security is important but don't obsess
3. Spend time in nature
daily_advice.gemini:
1. Focus on one topic, don't scatter
2. Stand behind your words
3. Make time for deep relationships
daily_advice.cancer:
1. Express your emotions, don't hold them in
2. Don't get stuck in the past
3. Make time for yourself too
daily_advice.leo:
1. Don't forget humility
2. Allow others to shine too
3. Be open to criticism
daily_advice.virgo:
1. Let go of perfectionism
2. Stop criticizing yourself
3. Allow spontaneity
daily_advice.libra:
1. Make a decision and stand behind it
2. Put your own needs first
3. Don't avoid conflict
daily_advice.scorpio:
1. Learn to let go, don't control
2. Try to trust
3. Stay on the surface sometimes, not everything has to be deep
daily_advice.sagittarius:
1. Pay attention to details
2. Keep your promises, don't over-promise
3. Focus on the present moment
daily_advice.capricorn:
1. Don't forget to have fun
2. Make room for your emotions
3. You have value beyond success
daily_advice.aquarius:
1. Allow emotional connections
2. Sometimes traditional ways work too
3. Make time for close relationships
daily_advice.pisces:
1. Keep your feet on the ground, be practical
2. Protect your boundaries
3. Stay in your own reality
daily_advice.default:
1. Take care of yourself
2. Trust your intuitions
3. Stay positive

daily_affirmations.leo: The light within me shines. My creativity and courage are infinite.

love_energies.aries: You have a passionate, spontaneous and adventurous love energy. You don't hesitate to take the first step. You seek conquest and excitement.
love_energies.taurus: You're a loyal, sensual and determined lover. You seek security and stability. Romance and physical touch are very important.
love_energies.gemini: You build intellectual connections. Communication and mental harmony are essential. You're a versatile and playful lover.
love_energies.cancer: You build deep emotional bonds. You're a protective and nurturing lover. Your instinct to build family and home is strong.
love_energies.leo: You're a generous and romantic lover. You expect admiration and appreciation. Grand gestures and showy love are your style.
love_energies.virgo: You're a careful and thoughtful lover. You pay attention to details and love through service. You seek perfection.
love_energies.libra: You seek partnership and harmony. You're a romantic and aesthetic lover. Balance and justice in relationships are important.
love_energies.scorpio: You're an intense and passionate lover. You expect deep commitment and loyalty. You have an all-or-nothing approach.
love_energies.sagittarius: You're a free-spirited and adventurous lover. Growth and discovery should be together. You seek philosophical harmony.
love_energies.capricorn: You're a determined and reliable lover. You think long-term and invest. Status and security are important.
love_energies.aquarius: You have a friendship-based understanding of love. You expect respect for individuality. Unusual relationships attract you.
love_energies.pisces: You're a romantic and idealistic lover. You seek a deep spiritual connection. You love with sacrifice and compassion.
love_energies.default: You have a unique love energy!

ideal_partners.aries: Independent, energetic, open to adventure. Someone who respects your leadership but stands on their own feet. A partner who isn't afraid to compete and challenges you.
ideal_partners.taurus: Reliable, loyal, providing material security. Someone who loves to touch, shares food and beautiful things. A patient and determined person.
ideal_partners.gemini: Smart, communicative, curious. Someone who can talk with you for hours, offers new ideas. A flexible and change-open person.
ideal_partners.cancer: Emotionally accessible, protective, family-focused. Someone who values home and family. An intuitive and compassionate person.
ideal_partners.leo: Admires you, supportive but has their own light. Social and fun. Someone who elevates you but doesn't compete in ego.
ideal_partners.virgo: Organized, reliable, practical. Someone who pays attention to details, shares a healthy lifestyle. A person open to criticism and believes in growth.
ideal_partners.libra: Strong aesthetic sense, diplomatic, harmonious. Someone who can show determination, social and cultured. A fair and balanced person.
ideal_partners.scorpio: Loyal, intense, deep. Someone you can share your secrets with safely, who commits completely. A passionate person who avoids superficiality.
ideal_partners.sagittarius: Free-spirited, adventurous, philosophical. Someone who gives you room to grow, open to travel and discovery. An optimistic and fun person.
ideal_partners.capricorn: Ambitious, reliable, long-term thinking. Someone who supports your goals, status-conscious. A hardworking and determined person.
ideal_partners.aquarius: Unique, independent, progressive. Someone who respects your individuality, builds friendly relationships. Someone who wants to change the world.
ideal_partners.pisces: Romantic, intuitive, compassionate. Someone who can build a spiritual connection, artistic. An empathetic person who shares your dreams.
ideal_partners.default: A perfect partner worthy of you!

theta_healing.title: Theta Healing
theta_healing.subtitle: Subconscious Transformation Practice
theta_healing.intro_description: Theta Healing is a healing technique aimed at transforming subconscious beliefs and energy blocks in the theta brain wave state (4-7 Hz). This practice helps you discover limiting beliefs and create positive changes.

intro.theta_state_content: Theta brain waves (4-7 Hz) are active during deep meditation, dreaming, and moments of creativity. In this state, direct access to the subconscious is possible and profound changes can be made.
intro.limiting_beliefs_content: There are belief patterns formed in childhood that unconsciously affect our lives. With Theta Healing, you can identify and transform these beliefs.
intro.energy_transformation_content: Energy blocks at the physical, mental, and spiritual levels are resolved. The healing process begins at the cellular level and spreads throughout your entire being.
intro.seven_planes_content: Theta Healing works with the 7 planes of existence in the universe: Minerals, Plants, Animals, Humans, Spirits, Laws, and Creative Energy.

chart.cosmic_map_description: This chart is a snapshot of the sky at the moment you were born ‚Äî but it's so much more. It's a coded map of the potentials, lessons, and gifts your soul brought into this world. Each planet is an inner voice, each sign an energy pattern, each house a life domain. This chart doesn't limit you ‚Äî it reminds you of who you are.

sun_sign_summary.aries: [[Fire]] element energy-filled, [[Aries]] symbolizes leadership and initiative. [[Sun]] here gives strong willpower and courage.
sun_sign_summary.taurus: With the stable energy of [[Earth]] element, [[Taurus]] seeks security and comfort. Under [[Venus]] rulership, art and beauty are important.
sun_sign_summary.gemini: With the intelligence and curiosity of [[Air]] element, [[Gemini]] stands out with communication and learning abilities. Under [[Mercury]] rulership, information flow is important.
sun_sign_summary.cancer: With the emotional depth of [[Water]] element, [[Cancer]] is sensitive about family and home matters. Under [[Moon]] rulership, emotions are intense.
sun_sign_summary.leo: With the creative energy of [[Fire]] element, [[Leo]] is identified with self-expression and drama. [[Sun]] shines at its strongest here.
sun_sign_summary.virgo: With the practical energy of [[Earth]] element, [[Virgo]] focuses on details and perfection. Under [[Mercury]] rulership, analytical power is high.
sun_sign_summary.libra: With the social energy of [[Air]] element, [[Libra]] seeks balance and harmony. Under [[Venus]] rulership, relationships are at the forefront.
sun_sign_summary.scorpio: With the transformative energy of [[Water]] element, [[Scorpio]] experiences deep and intense emotions. Under [[Pluto]] rulership, transformation is essential.
sun_sign_summary.sagittarius: With the adventurous energy of [[Fire]] element, [[Sagittarius]] is drawn to freedom and exploration. Under [[Jupiter]] rulership, expansion is important.
sun_sign_summary.capricorn: With the disciplined energy of [[Earth]] element, [[Capricorn]] has awareness of success and responsibility. Under [[Saturn]] rulership, structure and boundaries are important.
sun_sign_summary.aquarius: With the innovative energy of [[Air]] element, [[Aquarius]] works for independence and humanity. Under [[Uranus]] rulership, revolutionary ideas stand out.
sun_sign_summary.pisces: With the mystical energy of [[Water]] element, [[Pisces]] is open to intuition and spiritual connections. Under [[Neptune]] rulership, imagination is limitless.
sun_sign_summary.default: Your sign reflects cosmic energies in a unique way.

sun_sign_interpretation.aries:
Having [[Sun]] in [[Aries]] shows that at the core of your soul, you are a warrior and pioneer. This energy under [[Mars]] rulership gives you the courage to take the first step in life.

This [[Cardinal]] sign has natural talent for new beginnings and leadership. Combined with [[Fire]] element, your passion and energy affect and motivate those around you.

On your evolutionary journey, [[ego]] and individuality themes are important. Your natural relationship with the [[1st House]] emphasizes the need to discover yourself and express your authentic identity.

Because [[Sun]] is "exalted" here, your life force and will are extremely strong. The [[shadow]] aspect to watch is the tendency toward impatience and acting without thinking.
sun_sign_interpretation.taurus:
Having [[Sun]] in [[Taurus]] shows that your soul manifests in the most stable form of [[Earth]] element. Under [[Venus]] rulership, you have a deep connection with beauty, values, and the material world.

As a [[Fixed]] sign, it gives you endurance and determination. Once you make a decision, you don't stop until you reach your goal - this is both your strength and potential [[shadow]] area.

Your natural relationship with the [[2nd House]] provides talents in material security, self-worth, and resource management. Related to the [[throat chakra]], voice and expression are important themes for you.

Sensory experiences - food, music, touch - are not just pleasure for you, but spiritual nourishment. [[Venus]] transits mark important periods in your life.
sun_sign_interpretation.gemini:
Having [[Sun]] in [[Gemini]] shows that your mind is constantly in motion and you have an insatiable curiosity about gathering information. Under [[Mercury]] rulership, communication and information are your superpower.

This [[Mutable]] sign gives the ability to adapt and be flexible. Multiple interests and talents are your natural state - this is not chaos, but the natural expression of [[Air]] element.

Your natural relationship with the [[3rd House]] brings important experiences in local environment, siblings, and short journeys. [[Duality]] - going back and forth between two directions - is an important theme for you.

[[Mercury retrograde]] periods are especially important for you; introspection and looking back are valuable during these times. Meditation and silence practice are recommended for your mental health.
sun_sign_interpretation.cancer:
Having [[Sun]] in [[Cancer]] shows that your emotional intelligence and protective instincts are strong. Under [[Moon]] rulership, emotions and intuition are at the center of your life.

As a [[Cardinal]] [[Water]] sign, your capacity for emotional leadership and taking initiative is high. You can do anything for your family and loved ones.

Your natural relationship with the [[4th House]] highlights home, family roots, and emotional security themes. The [[mother archetype]] and nurturing energy strongly resonate with you.

[[Moon phases]] deeply affect your life. Full moon and new moon periods are especially sensitive and powerful times for you. Learning to set emotional boundaries is your evolutionary task.
sun_sign_interpretation.leo:
Having [[Sun]] in [[Leo]] represents the brightest and most magnificent expression of your soul. Since [[Sun]] is "in domicile" here, your creative power and self-expression are extremely strong.

As a [[Fixed]] [[Fire]] sign, your passion and determination are impressive. Being on stage, being seen and appreciated is not just ego for you, but a spiritual need.

Your natural relationship with the [[5th House]] brings important experiences in creativity, romance, children, and entertainment. The [[heart chakra]] is strongly connected to you.

[[Solar eclipses]] create turning points in your life. Humility and the capacity to see others' light are qualities to develop on your evolutionary journey.
sun_sign_interpretation.virgo:
Having [[Sun]] in [[Virgo]] shows that your analytical intelligence and service-oriented nature are strong. Under [[Mercury]] rulership, your capacity to see details and organize is superior.

As a [[Mutable]] [[Earth]] sign, your ability to produce practical solutions and adapt is developed. Perfectionism is both your strength and [[shadow]] area.

Your natural relationship with the [[6th House]] highlights health, daily routines, and service themes. Building a conscious relationship with your body is important.

[[Mercury]]'s power in [[Virgo]] gives healing and analytical abilities. Learning to show yourself the same care you show others is your evolutionary task.
sun_sign_interpretation.libra:
Having [[Sun]] in [[Libra]] shows that relationships and balance are at the center of your life. Under [[Venus]] rulership, harmony and beauty are fundamental values for you.

As a [[Cardinal]] [[Air]] sign, you have natural talent for social initiative and building relationships. Your sense of diplomacy and justice is developed.

Your natural relationship with the [[7th House]] brings important life lessons in partnerships, marriage, and the "other" theme. Understanding the [[projection]] mechanism is important for you.

Since [[Sun]] is "in fall" here, individuality and independence themes can be challenging. Finding the balance of maintaining your own identity while relating is your evolutionary task.
sun_sign_interpretation.scorpio:
Having [[Sun]] in [[Scorpio]] shows that your soul is connected to deep transformation and rebirth themes. Under [[Pluto]] rulership, intensity and power are your natural state.

As a [[Fixed]] [[Water]] sign, your emotional depth and determination are impressive. Your ability to see below the surface and reveal hidden truths is strong.

Your natural relationship with the [[8th House]] brings deep experiences in shared resources, sexuality, death-rebirth cycles, and [[psychological transformation]] themes.

[[Pluto transits]] mark periods of radical transformation in your life. Letting go of control and learning to trust are the most important lessons on your evolutionary journey.
sun_sign_interpretation.sagittarius:
Having [[Sun]] in [[Sagittarius]] shows that your soul is characterized by freedom, adventure, and the search for meaning. Under [[Jupiter]] rulership, expansion and growth are your natural tendency.

As a [[Mutable]] [[Fire]] sign, your enthusiasm and ideals carry you forward. Philosophy, higher education, and foreign cultures inspire you.

Your natural relationship with the [[9th House]] brings important experiences in long journeys, higher education, philosophy, and belief systems.

[[Jupiter]] transits mark periods of luck and expansion in your life. Preventing scattering and deepening are qualities to develop on your evolutionary journey.
sun_sign_interpretation.capricorn:
Having [[Sun]] in [[Capricorn]] shows that your soul is deeply connected to success, responsibility, and long-term goals. Under [[Saturn]] rulership, discipline and structure are your natural state.

As a [[Cardinal]] [[Earth]] sign, your capacity for leadership and achieving practical success is high. Time is your ally - you become even stronger with age.

Your natural relationship with the [[10th House]] brings important life lessons in career, social status, reputation, and the [[father archetype]] theme.

[[Saturn return]] (approximately every 29 years) marks important maturation periods in your life. Learning emotional softness and pleasure is your evolutionary task.
sun_sign_interpretation.aquarius:
Having [[Sun]] in [[Aquarius]] shows that your soul is deeply connected to uniqueness, humanity, and progress. Under [[Uranus]] rulership, revolutionary ideas and originality are your natural state.

As a [[Fixed]] [[Air]] sign, your commitment to your ideas is strong. Social change and collective consciousness inspire you.

Your natural relationship with the [[11th House]] brings important experiences in groups, friendships, hopes, and humanitarian ideals.

[[Uranus]] transits mark periods of unexpected changes and liberation in your life. Building emotional intimacy and individual connections is your evolutionary task.
sun_sign_interpretation.pisces:
Having [[Sun]] in [[Pisces]] shows that your soul is deeply connected to spiritual realms, intuition, and the collective unconscious. Under [[Neptune]] rulership, mysticism and creativity are your natural state.

As a [[Mutable]] [[Water]] sign, your capacity for empathy and adaptation is extremely developed. The dissolution of boundaries is both your strength and [[shadow]] area to watch.

Your natural relationship with the [[12th House]] brings deep experiences in unconscious, spiritual practices, solitude, and [[karmic]] themes.

[[Neptune]] transits mark periods of spiritual awakening and dissolution in your life. Setting healthy boundaries and staying connected to practical reality is your evolutionary task.
sun_sign_interpretation.default: Your Sun sign interpretation is being prepared...

synastry.title: Synastry
synastry.kadim_content: In the dance of two souls, the stars reveal not just compatibility, but the deeper lessons each person brings to the other. Synastry is the ancient art of reading these cosmic conversations.

sun_sign_interpretations.aries: As a natural leader, you are brave and entrepreneurial. You don't shy away from new beginnings, and your competitive spirit drives you forward.
sun_sign_interpretations.taurus: You have a determined and reliable nature. Material security and comfort are important to you; your patience and persistence help you achieve your goals.
sun_sign_interpretations.gemini: You are curious with diverse interests. Your communication skills are strong, and you enjoy intellectual conversations in your social circle.
sun_sign_interpretations.cancer: You stand out with your emotional depth and intuition. Family and home are very important to you; you have a protective and nurturing nature.
sun_sign_interpretations.leo: You attract attention with your creativity and charisma. You carry leadership qualities and enjoy being the center of attention.
sun_sign_interpretations.virgo: You are known for your analytical mind and attention to detail. Your perfectionist approach is both your strength and an area to develop.
sun_sign_interpretations.libra: You are in search of balance and harmony. Relationships are very important to you, and your sense of justice is strong; you are known for your diplomatic skills.
sun_sign_interpretations.scorpio: You have a deep and intense nature. Your ability to solve mysteries and your power of transformation make you unique; your loyalty is unquestionable.
sun_sign_interpretations.sagittarius: You are known for your free spirit and quest for adventure. You have a philosophical nature and are constantly seeking to learn and explore.
sun_sign_interpretations.capricorn: Your ambition and determination help you achieve your goals. You are disciplined and responsible, valuing long-term plans.
sun_sign_interpretations.aquarius: You stand out with your innovative and independent thinking. You have great ideals for humanity and don't shy away from being unconventional.
sun_sign_interpretations.pisces: You are known for your intuitive and empathic nature. Your artistic talents and spiritual inclinations make you special.

moon_sign_interpretations.aries: Your emotional reactions are quick and passionate. You may experience impatience, but your emotional courage is impressive.
moon_sign_interpretations.taurus: Emotional security is very important to you. You have a stable and reliable emotional nature, though you may resist change.
moon_sign_interpretations.gemini: You are skilled at expressing your emotions. Curiosity and communication are part of your emotional needs.
moon_sign_interpretations.cancer: With the Moon in its home sign, your emotional intuition is very strong. You carry the universal mother/father archetype.
moon_sign_interpretations.leo: You have a warm and enthusiastic emotional nature. Being loved and appreciated is your emotional need.
moon_sign_interpretations.virgo: Your emotional analysis ability is strong. Serving others brings you emotional satisfaction.
moon_sign_interpretations.libra: Relationships are essential for your emotional balance. Harmony and aesthetics bring you peace.
moon_sign_interpretations.scorpio: You experience deep and intense emotional experiences. Emotional transformation and healing are your core themes.
moon_sign_interpretations.sagittarius: You need emotional freedom. Your optimism and adventurous spirit nourish you.
moon_sign_interpretations.capricorn: You try to keep your emotions under control. Emotional maturity and responsibility are important themes for you.
moon_sign_interpretations.aquarius: Emotional independence is important to you. Your feelings for humanity are strong.
moon_sign_interpretations.pisces: You have an intuitive and empathic emotional nature. Spiritual experiences are part of your emotional nourishment.

ascendant_interpretations.aries: As a first impression, you appear energetic, determined, and leader-spirited. You project a brave and entrepreneurial image.
ascendant_interpretations.taurus: You are perceived as calm, reliable, and grounded. Your physical appearance is impressive.
ascendant_interpretations.gemini: You radiate curious, communicative, and youthful energy. You are perceived as agile and witty.
ascendant_interpretations.cancer: You are seen as warm, protective, and nurturing. Home and family themes are prominent in your life.
ascendant_interpretations.leo: You are perceived as charismatic, eye-catching, and self-confident. The stage is a natural arena for you.
ascendant_interpretations.virgo: You are seen as organized, analytical, and detail-oriented. You project a helpful and practical image.
ascendant_interpretations.libra: You are perceived as elegant, balanced, and diplomatic. Relationships are at the center of your life.
ascendant_interpretations.scorpio: You are seen as mysterious, intense, and magnetic. You have a powerful presence.
ascendant_interpretations.sagittarius: You are perceived as optimistic, adventurous, and free-spirited. You carry a philosophical air.
ascendant_interpretations.capricorn: You are seen as serious, professional, and ambitious. You may be perceived as an authority figure.
ascendant_interpretations.aquarius: You are perceived as different, innovative, and independent. You display an original style.
ascendant_interpretations.pisces: You are seen as dreamy, artistic, and spiritual. You radiate an empathic and understanding energy.

health_crisis.label: Health Struggle

spiritual_awakening.label: Spiritual Awakening
spiritual_awakening.interpretation_focus: Spiritual development, transcendent experiences, searching for meaning

new_beginning.label: New Beginning

style_guides.jungian:
- Focus on archetypes: Shadow, Anima/Animus, Wise Old Man, etc.
- Emphasize the individuation process
- Provide references from the collective unconscious
- Distinguish between universal and personal meanings of symbols
style_guides.spiritual:
- Write in a spiritual guidance tone
- Emphasize cosmic messages and signs
- Add meditation and spiritual practice suggestions
- Talk about higher self and spiritual development
style_guides.practical:
- Give concrete and actionable advice
- Make direct connections to daily life
- Use minimal mystical language
- Approach with problem-solving focus
style_guides.esoteric:
- Reference ancient wisdom and mystical traditions
- Open deeper layers of symbolism
- Use esoteric concepts but explain them
- Make references to hidden teachings
style_guides.psychological:
- Use scientific psychology terminology
- Suggest emotion regulation and coping strategies
- Identify defense mechanisms
- Offer therapeutic insights

seasonal_insights.spring: Spring energy supports new beginnings and rebirth. Sprouting seeds and blooming flowers in your dreams carry hope.
seasonal_insights.summer: Summer energy brings extroversion and abundance. Sun and warmth in your dreams represent life force.
seasonal_insights.autumn: Autumn is a time for letting go and harvest. Falling leaves and harvest symbols in your dreams indicate completion.
seasonal_insights.winter: Winter is a time for introspection and rest. Snow and cold in your dreams represent cleansing and preparation for a new beginning.

day_insights.Friday: Venus day Friday is open to love and beauty dreams.
day_insights.Saturday: Saturn day Saturday brings dreams about boundaries and structure.
day_insights.Sunday: Sun day Sunday is conducive to self and identity discovery dreams.

surface_messages.korku: An alarm is sounding within. Your subconscious wants to warn you about something.
surface_messages.huzur: You are in inner balance. This dream celebrates your peace.
surface_messages.merak: New doors are opening in your mind. This dream is inviting you to explore.
surface_messages.sucluluk: A burden of consciousness wants to speak. You might be carrying a debt from the past.
surface_messages.ozlem: A valuable part of your soul is missing. Something is calling you back.
surface_messages.heyecan: Energy is rising - something new is on the horizon.
surface_messages.donukluk: Emotions are temporarily muted - a protection mechanism.
surface_messages.ofke: Boundaries have been pushed - power wants to be reclaimed.

deeper_meanings.korku: Beneath fear there is usually love. What are you afraid of losing?
deeper_meanings.huzur: This peace signals conflict resolved. Which inner war has ended?
deeper_meanings.merak: Curiosity is the soul's call to grow. You are ready to open to the unknown.
deeper_meanings.sucluluk: Guilt is sometimes internalizing others' voices. Whose voice is this?
deeper_meanings.ozlem: Longing is the desire to return to lost wholeness. When did you feel whole?
deeper_meanings.heyecan: Excitement is the peak of life energy. Where will you direct this energy?
deeper_meanings.donukluk: Numbness is protection from feeling too much. What are you avoiding feeling?
deeper_meanings.ofke: Anger is the voice of suppressed power. Where do you want your power back?

shadow_questions.korku: What would happen if what you fear came true?
shadow_questions.merak: What question are you afraid to find the answer to?
shadow_questions.sucluluk: What would change if you forgave yourself?
shadow_questions.ozlem: If what you long for returned, could you accept it?
shadow_questions.heyecan: What remains when this excitement fades?
shadow_questions.donukluk: If you were to feel, what would you feel?
shadow_questions.ofke: What pain lies beneath the anger?

integration_paths.korku: Face your fear, but be gentle. Approach what you fear in small steps.
integration_paths.huzur: Remember this peace and carry it into daily life. Reinforce with meditation.
integration_paths.merak: Write down your questions, learn to live with questions rather than seeking answers.
integration_paths.sucluluk: Examine the guilt: is it real or learned? Write a letter to yourself.
integration_paths.ozlem: Honor the longing but stay present. Accepting loss opens doors to the future.
integration_paths.heyecan: Transform excitement into action. Take a step today.
integration_paths.donukluk: Return to your body. Move, breathe, slowly begin to feel.
integration_paths.ofke: Express anger healthily: sports, writing, creativity. But don't hurt anyone.

avoidances.korku: This week, avoid impulsive decisions made to escape fear.
avoidances.huzur: Gently distance yourself from those who want to disturb your peace.
avoidances.ozlem: Avoid getting stuck in the past.
avoidances.heyecan: Avoid scattering your energy, stay focused.

whisper_quotes.0: The night spoke for you, now you speak during the day.
whisper_quotes.1: One who remembers dreams has begun to listen to their soul.
whisper_quotes.2: Every symbol is a key, every emotion a door.
whisper_quotes.3: The subconscious doesn't lie, it just speaks in code.
whisper_quotes.4: You can't escape your shadow, but you can dance with it.
whisper_quotes.5: Ancient wisdom whispers, the one who hears in silence listens.

archetype_integration.child: Maintain your connection with your inner child, nurture your curiosity.
